channel.title: Hamachi wat is it realy
channel.description:
hamachi wat is it
1. what is it ? 2. were get it from 3.what is it used for 4.do i need it to run a sever 5.umm thankes

item.title: Hamachi wat is it realy
item.dc:creator: @darkstar447 darkstar447
item.description:
@darkstar447 wrote:

im not much help but it is a thing that lets u run a server without portfowarding and u get it from hamachi.com i think. it is not the only way to run a server but it is much easier if u dont no how to portforward but if u do u can easily portforwad using a router hope i helped

Read full topic

item.title: Hamachi wat is it realy
item.dc:creator: @artash artash
item.description:
@artash wrote:

1.Its just a substitute for port-fowarding.
2. Search “hamachi” in google -_-
3. just another way for ppl to connect to your server
4. No, you can port - foward or use it. Eather way. Depends which is easier for you.
5. Youre welcome
